Please note: Each pantry has its own guidelines. Check with them about specific eligibility requirements and pick-up limits. Benicia Community Action Council , 480 Military East, Benicia , Tuesday & Thursday 10:00am-1:00pm. Phone: 707-745-0900 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Food is Free Bay Area , 1400 E 2nd St, Benicia , Tuesday 9:00-10:30am.
							This food distribution is located at Heritage Presbyterian Church. Additional distributions listed on Food is Free Bay Area's calendar at www.fifbayarea.org. Phone: 707-690-0945 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. St. Dominic’s Conference (SVdP) , 475 East I St, Benicia , .
							By appointment only. Call to make a reservation. Deliveries only sent within Benicia. Phone: 707-746-1773 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Partner Soup Kitchen Soup kitchens provide FREE meals to anyone who comes in during meal hours. Menus vary, although each soup kitchen tries to offer balanced meals. St. Paul's Episcopal Church , 120 E J St, Benicia , Monday & Wednesday 4:30-6:00pm. Phone: 707-745-0307 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Printer Friendly List Locations Concord: 925-676-7543 4010 Nelson Ave
Concord, CA 94520 Fairfield: 707-421-9777 2370 N Watney Way
